attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that the decision to delay unfair bank charges repayment to us the more diadvantaged and poor people is grossly unfair. 
I think it's time that the Prime Minister step in and get the banks to repay allcharges. Before Christmas would be very much appreciated.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
